ssoErrors.AccountNotFound: Account not found. Please contact your administrator.
ssoErrors.NoEmail: No email address received from Microsoft.

ssoErrors.OAuthSignin: An error occurred while signing in with Microsoft. Please try again.

activate.title: Activate account
activate.subtitle: Set your password to activate your account
activate.successMessage: Your account has been successfully activated. You will be redirected to the login page...
activate.errorMinLength: Password must be at least 6 characters

forgotPassword.title: Forgot password
forgotPassword.subtitle: Enter your email address to receive a reset link
forgotPassword.successMessage: If the email address is registered with us, you will receive an email with instructions to reset your password.

resetPassword.title: Set new password
resetPassword.subtitle: Choose a new password for your account
resetPassword.successMessage: Your password has been successfully changed. You will be redirected to the login page...
resetPassword.errorMinLength: Password must be at least 6 characters

new.title: New supplier request
new.description: Enter the basic details to onboard a new supplier
new.label: Label *
new.labelDescription: The brand for which this request is being created
new.supplierLanguageDescription: The language for the supplier form and emails
new.howToContinue: How would you like to continue?
new.sendInvitationDescription: The supplier receives an email to fill in the form themselves
new.selfFillDescription: You fill in the details on behalf of the supplier
new.noPermission: You do not have permission to create new requests.
new.successSelfFill: Request created. You can now fill in the details.
new.successEtherealTitle: The invitation has been created and the email has been sent via the test SMTP server.
new.successEtherealDescription: In demo mode, emails are sent via Ethereal, a test SMTP server. Click the link below to view the sent message:

edit.noPermission: You do not have permission to edit this request.
edit.cannotEdit: This request cannot be edited in its current status.
edit.supplierTypeDescription: Change the supplier type if needed
edit.supplierDetailsFilledDescription: Details filled in by supplier - review and adjust if needed
edit.documentsDescription: Upload Chamber of Commerce extract, passport / ID and bank details screenshot
edit.purchaserDetailsDescription: These details must be added by the purchaser
edit.successSubmit: Details saved and forwarded to Finance
edit.successSubmitERP: Details saved and forwarded to ERP

basic.title: Basic details
basic.description: Details entered when creating the request
basic.label: Label

vies.unavailable: VIES unavailable, VAT number could not be verified
vies.invalidFormat: Invalid format. Must start with an EU country code (e.g. NL, DE, BE).
vies.notFoundInVies: VAT number not found in VIES

finance.title: Finance
finance.exactXmlDescription: Copy this URL and paste it in Exact Globe to import the supplier

audit.title: Audit Trail
audit.description: Overview of all actions on this request

actions.selfFillConfirm: Do you want to fill in the form yourself? The supplier invitation will be invalidated.
actions.cancelMessage: Are you sure you want to cancel this request? You can reopen it later.
actions.deleteMessage: Are you sure you want to permanently delete this request? This cannot be undone.

form.title: Supplier Onboarding
form.welcome: Welcome {supplierName}. Please fill in your company details below.
form.savedNotice: You previously saved your details on {date}. Your earlier details have been filled in below.
form.invalidLinkMessage: The link may have expired or has already been used. Please contact your contact person for a new link.
form.thankYouMessage: Your details have been successfully submitted. You will receive a confirmation email shortly.
form.savedMessage: Your details have been saved. You will receive an email with a link to complete the form later.

financial.title: Financial details
financial.description: Fill in your company and bank details
financial.invoiceAddressHint: Only fill in if different from company address
financial.viesInvalid: VAT number not found in VIES
financial.viesUnavailable: VIES unavailable, VAT number could not be verified
financial.viesInvalidFormat: Invalid format. Must start with an EU country code (e.g. NL, DE, BE).

director.title: Director
director.description: Director details (required for suppliers outside the EU)
director.name: Director name *

form.savedSuccess: Details saved! You will receive an email with a link to continue later.

table.name: Name
table.confirmDeactivateMessage: Are you sure you want to deactivate {name} ({email})? The user will no longer be able to sign in.
table.confirmActivateMessage: Are you sure you want to activate {name} ({email})?

form.newDescription: Create a new user. The user will receive an activation email.

profile.title: My profile
profile.settingsDescription: Adjust your language preference and notifications
profile.receiveEmailsDescription: Receive notifications when a request requires your action
profile.passwordTooShort: Password must be at least 8 characters

notFound.title: Page not found
notFound.message: The page you are looking for does not exist or has been moved.

error.title: Something went wrong
error.message: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again or go back to the dashboard.

globalError.title: Something went wrong
globalError.message: A critical error occurred. Please try reloading the page.

emails.autoGenerated: This is an automatically generated email. Please do not reply.
emails.contactInfo: If you have any questions, please contact your contact person.

invitation.subject: Invitation for Supplier Onboarding - {label}
invitation.title: Welcome to {label}
invitation.body: You have been invited to fill in your company details for our supplier registration.
invitation.cta: Click the button below to get started:

supplierSave.subject: Your details have been saved - Supplier Onboarding
supplierSave.title: Details saved
supplierSave.body: Your details have been saved. You can continue filling in the form at any time using the link below:

supplierConfirmation.subject: Confirmation: Your details have been received
supplierConfirmation.title: Details received
supplierConfirmation.body: Thank you for filling in your details. We have received your submission.
supplierConfirmation.body2: Your details are now being reviewed by our purchasing department. You will be notified when the process is complete.

purchaserNotification.subject: Supplier {supplierName} has submitted details
purchaserNotification.title: Action required: Review supplier details
purchaserNotification.body: Supplier {supplierName} has filled in their details.
purchaserNotification.cta: Click the button below to review and complete the details:

financeNotification.subject: Supplier {supplierName} - Waiting for Finance
financeNotification.title: Action required: Enter creditor number
financeNotification.body: The supplier request for {supplierName} is ready for processing.
financeNotification.cta: Enter the creditor number to proceed:

erpNotification.subject: Supplier {supplierName} - Waiting for ERP
erpNotification.title: Action required: Enter KBT code
erpNotification.body: The supplier request for {supplierName} is ready for processing in ERP.
erpNotification.cta: Enter the KBT code to complete the registration:

completion.subject: Supplier {supplierName} - Registration completed
completion.title: Supplier registration completed
completion.bodyFinance: The supplier registration for {supplierName} has been fully completed.
completion.bodyPurchaser: The supplier registration for {supplierName} that you requested has been fully completed.

activation.subject: Activate your account - Supplier Onboarding
activation.title: Welcome to Supplier Onboarding
activation.body: An account has been created for you. Click the button below to set your password and activate your account:
activation.ignoreNotice: If you do not recognise this request, you can ignore this email.

passwordReset.subject: Reset password - Supplier Onboarding
passwordReset.title: Reset password
passwordReset.body: A request has been made to reset your password. Click the button below to set a new password:
passwordReset.linkValid: This link is valid until {time} (1 hour).
passwordReset.ignoreNotice: If you did not make this request, you can ignore this email.

reminder.subject: Reminder: Supplier request {supplierName}
reminder.title: Reminder
reminder.body: This is a reminder for the supplier request for {supplierName}.
reminder.cta: Your action is required to continue the process.
